parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To cover up, cover round about, veil round, blindfold. From peri and kalupto; to cover all around, i.e. Entirely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To interrogate, question, demand of. From epi and erotao; to ask for, i.e. Inquire, seek.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From prophetes; to foretell events, divine, speak under inspiration, exercise the prophetic office.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To strike, smite, sting. A primary verb; to hit; specially, to sting.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
